name: Icarus Saves The World
description:
Dr. Levo Genstar has invaded the heavens and upset the gods. And he didn't even have the decency to clean up after himself. Now the gods want to invade earth as revenge...

Icarus has been given the task by his magical bird companion to tidy up this mess. With the help of your enchanted feathers use the space scraps left over from Dr. Genstar's experiments to turn back the tide of angry gods and monsters, or use love instead to try and win the day 

❤️

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

arrows move

space bar fires feathers

enter to start and restart

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspired by Jason Rohrer's Passage and  Toby Fox's Undertale

Music by Pye Corner Audio, The Black Mill Video Tape

Buy the song on itunes: http://apple.co/2wKRKZU

Buy the song on google play: http://bit.ly/2yblRxg

Rock on!
